siteOverview.title: Site Overview
siteOverview.wallet: A private, secure ecash wallet to manage your funds.
siteOverview.findCreators: Discover and support your favorite creators on the Nostr network.
siteOverview.creatorHub: Manage your tiers, posts, and subscribers.
siteOverview.myProfile: View and edit your public profile.

siteOverview.restore: Restore your wallet from your seed phrase.
siteOverview.alreadyRunning: Handles cases where the app is open in another tab.
siteOverview.welcome: The initial welcome and setup screen.
